question: Mahmud Shah Bahmani died in which of the following years?
explanation: After the death of Qasim Barid, his son Amir Barid became the prime minister and controlled the administration of the Bahmani sultanate. Mahmud Shah Bahmani died in 1518 CE and after his death, he was succeeded by four sultans, one after another, but they were mere puppets in the hands of Amir Barid.
